channel.title: [317 PI] SolarX
channel.description:
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/29px1y9.png[/img]
[size=14pt]SolarX[/size]
[size=14pt] Introduction[/size] We are a group of developers trying to bring solarX to reality. I have made many servers but I have a good feeling about this one. :) Our goal is to become one of the biggest servers with lots of fun players. We will use [size=14pt]Dropbox [/size] so we can all program together, also [size=14pt]Skype[/size] will be used for communication. I plan on hosting this source.
[size=14pt]Pictures Of this so far[/size] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/3503p94.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/301pked.png[/img]
[size=14pt]Current Features[/size] green = complete red = incomplete blue = started
100% cooking 100% herblore 100% firemaking Bank pin added Shout to server when 99 custom minigame Some more unqiue content Full Skilling area Animations Models Perfect clipping 100% combat
[size=14pt]Layout[/size] Code: [Select] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you put on this project everyday? (requirement: atleast one hour a day): Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\
Coders:
1/3
Myself Person 2 Person 3
Suggestors:
0/2
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
0/8 (but really always open for testers)
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7 Person 8
[size=14pt]My skype name is dillon.crow[/size]

item.title: [317 PI] SolarX
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

Code: [java]
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Night_Stalker
How old are you?:17
What position do you want? (Coder Developer, Suggester, Tester): Developer
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: almost a year know
What time zone are you in?:Australian time, Victoria
How long can you put on this project everyday? (requirement: atleast one hour a day): I am usually on everyday for about 3-5 hours
Why do you want to become part of this server?: well i just currently quit my 667/728 Corrupted-souls after nearly 5 months of it up and running i thought it was time to start fresh again.
Any Suggestions?: i suggest making a home instead of using ones that have been used before, use custom tiles/walls/area also a suggestion command so when the do ::suggest it brings up a format that they can say wat they would like to suggest and then when they click send, it saves it to a file in the source.
//Other Info Below Here\

Im easy going great to get along with, always have time for new ideas and try outs, play music just the casual teenager

Read full topic
